name: Weaponary Chaos
description:
W,A,S,D or arrow keys to move

Aim and shoot with mouse

An evil wizard has cast a spell that has made weapons alive and they are trying to kill you 

The sound effects are pretty bad I put them up last minute

Thanks for playing 

Made by Mayur Games for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Couldn't submit because of some issue would love extra time to submit
